testcase.name: login

failure.message:
3 expectations failed. Expected status code <201> but was <401>.
Expected status line "HTTP/1.1 201 " doesn't match actual status line "HTTP/1.1 401 ".
JSON path data.role doesn't match. Expected: SHOPPER Actual: null
